reflection.speaker: Narrator
reflection.text: Days have passed since you took over Dragon Haven Cafe. Already, so much has changed.

achievements.speaker: Narrator
achievements.text: Your first customers have come and gone. The little dragon has hatched, filling the cafe with new life.

looking_forward.speaker: Narrator
looking_forward.text: Word is spreading about the reopened cafe. Travelers from distant places are starting to arrive...

new_chapter.speaker: Narrator
new_chapter.text: A weathered stranger enters the cafe. He carries himself like someone who has seen much of the world.

marcus_teaser.speaker: Narrator
marcus_teaser.text: His eyes hold a mixture of weariness and hope. Perhaps his story will be the first of many you'll hear in this place.
